reviews.review_msg: She tells you exactly what she expects from you, ie. points you should make in your essays, things you should avoid, etc.  Great prof, makes the material enjoyable even for someone who doesn't major in the Humanities.  I definitely improved as a writer.  Doesn't hurt that she is a BABE either!

She is SOOO awesome. Very funny, love class discussion. Only class that I feel noticed by the prof. She is very smart and helpful. She cares about her students and is willing to help if you want/need it. STRONGLY SUGGEST. Great teacher, interesting class.
